title: And Just Like That....Episode 6 Review - "Diwali"
itunes:title: And Just Like That....Episode 6 Review - "Diwali"
itunes:subtitle: Aging gracefully or naw?
description:
Boy.....were we off in our theories with how this week's episode was going to go. Who knew Carrie would be buying a GAWDY apartment (which by the way was a shoddily built apartment on a soundstage), that we'd get to see more of Sima and ABSOLUTELY keep falling in love with her, and that Miranda's affair would be discussed in such a bizzaro way with her friends. In addition to the above, this weeks episode brought up some thought provoking questions like: would you decide to age gracefully or be all about the elective cosmetic surgeries? Thoughts on arranged marriages and would you lie to those around you regarding a fake relationship to make your life easier? And finally, did you know that the Golden Girls were the SAME age as Carrie, Miranda and Charlotte are now in the show? Wild huh?


Join us this week as we go down the rabbit hole on all things for the new episode of the Sex and the City reboot!



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
